title: Trip Management System
description: Manages and tracks the sales of bus tickets and the position of the bus through GPS and WebSockets for real-time updates.

title: Pyscribe
description: A Python-TrOCR driven prototype device for scanning and digitizing antibiotic prescriptions with a fine-tuned model.

title: LSCS CMS
description: Content Management System for La Salle Computer Society to manage events, members, and organizational content.

title: LEAP Week 2025
description: Website for LEAP Week 2025 - The Lasallian Enrichment Alternative Program celebrating personal growth, creativity, and learning. Theme: Soar Beyond Limits.
